title: Process an International Player Transfer
description: A soccer team is signing a player from a team in another country. An agent must handle the international transfer process.

tasks.description: Submit the official transfer request through the international governing body's transfer matching system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the transfer request.

tasks.description: Arrange for the payment of the transfer fee to the player's old club.
Apply for the player's work visa and international transfer certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits all the necessary paperwork for the player's registration.
